sql.query: select per.person_id , per.marital_status ,per.known_As ,per.internal_location ,per.office_number ,per.mailstop , per.effective_start_date per_start , per.effective_end_date per_end From per_all_people_f per where per.person_id in (130, 27299)

select assgn.assignment_id , assgn.effective_start_date asgn_start , assgn.effective_end_date asgn_end ,assgn.supervisor_id ,assgn.organization_id ,assgn.job_id , assgn.person_id , assgn.manager_flag , assgn.assignment_number From per_all_assignments_f assgn where assgn.primary_flag = 'Y' and assgn.person_id in (130, 27299)
